languages.text: {n}Лицо инквизитора каменеет, и, сведя брови, он мрачно отвечает:{/n} "Я отвергаю твои обвинения, Инцендия. И забуду о сказанных словах... Один раз".
{n}The Inquisitor's face hardens. His eyebrows furrowed, he replies grimly,{/n} "I reject your accusations, Incendia. And I will forget your words... this once."
languages.original_text: {n}Лицо инквизитора каменеет, и, сведя брови, он мрачно отвечает:{/n} "Я отвергаю твои обвинения, Инцендия. И забуду о сказанных словах... Один раз".

traits.locale_text: {n}The Inquisitor's face hardens, and, furrowing his brows, he replies darkly:{/n} "I reject your accusations, Incendia. And I shall forget your words... This one time."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: {n}Le visage de l'inquisiteur se durcit et il répond d'une voix sombre, les sourcils froncés :{/n} « Je rejette vos accusations, Incendia. Et je vais oublier vos paroles... pour cette fois. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisitor's face hardens. His eyebrows furrowed, he replies grimly,{/n} "I reject your accusations, Incendia. And I will forget your words... this once."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le visage de l'inquisiteur se durcit et il répond d'une voix sombre, les sourcils froncés :{/n} « Je rejette vos accusations, Incendia. Et je vais oublier vos paroles... pour cette fois. »
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: {n}El rostro del Inquisidor se endurece. Con el ceño fruncido, responde en tono sombrío:{/n} «Rechazo sus acusaciones, Incendia. Y olvidaré sus palabras... por esta vez».
languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisitor's face hardens. His eyebrows furrowed, he replies grimly,{/n} "I reject your accusations, Incendia. And I will forget your words... this once."

traits.locale_text: {n}El rostro del Inquisidor se endurece y, con el ceño fruncido, responde en tono sombrío:{/n} «Rechazo sus acusaciones, Incendia. Y olvidaré sus palabras... por esta vez».
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: {n}大审判官的脸变得冷硬。他眉头紧锁，阴沉地回答道。{/n}“我否认你的指控，因森蒂娅。而且我会忘记你说过的话……但只有这一次。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisitor's face hardens. His eyebrows furrowed, he replies grimly,{/n} "I reject your accusations, Incendia. And I will forget your words... this once."

traits.locale_text: {n}审判长的脸变得冷硬。他眉头紧锁，阴沉地回答道。{/n}“我否认你的指控，因森蒂娅。而且我会忘记你说过的话……但只有这一次。”
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: {n}Die Miene des Inquisitors verhärtet sich. Mit gerunzelter Stirn antwortet er grimmig: {/n} "Ich weise Eure Anschuldigungen zurück, Incendia. Und ich werde Eure Worte vergessen ... dieses eine Mal."
languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisitor's face hardens. His eyebrows furrowed, he replies grimly,{/n} "I reject your accusations, Incendia. And I will forget your words... this once."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Miene des Inquisitors verhärtet sich und er antwortet mit gerunzelter Stirn und in düsterem Ton:{/n} "Ich weise Eure Anschuldigungen zurück, Incendia. Und ich werde Eure Worte vergessen ... Dieses eine Mal."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: {n}異端審問官は顔をこわばらせ、眉をひそめながら重々しく答えた。{/n}「インセンディア、お前の告発は却下する。そして、その言葉も忘れよう…今回だけは」
languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisitor's face hardens. His eyebrows furrowed, he replies grimly,{/n} "I reject your accusations, Incendia. And I will forget your words... this once."

traits.locale_text: {n}異端審問官は顔をこわばらせ、眉をひそめながら重々しく答えた。{/n}「インセンディア、お前の告発は却下する。そして、その言葉も忘れよう…今回だけは」
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: {n}Engizisyoncu'nun ifadesi sertleşiyor. Kaşlarını çatarak sıkkın bir şekilde cevap veriyor.{/n} "İthamlarını reddediyorum İncendia. Söylediklerini bu seferlik duymamış gibi yapacağım."
languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisitor's face hardens. His eyebrows furrowed, he replies grimly,{/n} "I reject your accusations, Incendia. And I will forget your words... this once."
